channel.title: How do you post a pic?
channel.description: i got to the [img][/img] part but what do i do after that?[br][size=1]Posted on: May 29, 2007, 04:52:53 PM[/size][hr]

item.source: How do you post a pic?

item.title: How do you post a pic?
item.dc:creator: @LoveScaper LoveScaper
item.description:
@LoveScaper wrote:

[quote=“Pancakes, post:3, topic:102481”]im confused… you want to post a pic on forums? ok do this:

go to www.photobucket.com and register.

upload your pic there and it will give you the url for it.

stick the url between

[img][/img]

and you should have no problem you could reward me if ya want[/quote]Reported Can’t Ask To Be Rewarded For Rep,Items,Money,etc.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you post a pic?

item.title: How do you post a pic?
item.dc:creator: @xXjutXx xXjutXx
item.description:
@xXjutXx wrote:

[quote=“Pancakes, post:3, topic:102481”]im confused… you want to post a pic on forums? ok do this:

go to www.photobucket.com and register.

upload your pic there and it will give you the url for it.

stick the url between

[img][/img]

and you should have no problem you could reward me if ya want[/quote]
u need to register for that but if u want to upload it without doing long fill out forms then use

www.imageshack.us Thats an alternative lets u upload photos from site or from ur own gallery or music i think but i know it lets u upload videos :]

Read full topic
